hardState.name: Aurora Berg
hardState.description: A towering, many-tiered iceberg whose shelves host rival super-penguin colonies.

hardState.name: Aurora Stack
hardState.description: A vertical colony carved into the sunlit face of Aurora Berg, known for orderly terraces and bright trade banners.

hardState.name: Nightfall Shelf
hardState.description: A shadowed ledge on the far side of Aurora Berg, lit by bioluminescent ice glyphs and whispered deals.

hardState.name: Krill Shoals
hardState.description: Dense drifting clouds of krill that pass regularly beneath Aurora Stack, the lifeblood of its fisheries.

hardState.name: The Glow-Fissure
hardState.description: A deep crack in the ice under Nightfall Shelf that pulses with otherworldly light and warps the currents.

hardState.name: Windward Ridge
hardState.description: A knife-edge crest of ice where the high winds carve strange patterns and carry news between colonies.

hardState.name: The Icebound Exchange
hardState.description: A merchant guild that monopolizes trade through Aurora Stack, issuing carved-ice credit chits and regulating fish prices.

hardState.name: The Midnight Claws
hardState.description: A clandestine syndicate ruling Nightfall Shelf from the shadows, smuggling forbidden tech and siphoning magic from the Glow-Fissure.

hardState.name: High-Beak Auditor Selka
hardState.description: The meticulous mayor of Aurora Stack, famed for balancing ledgers as easily as she balances on sheer ice walls.

hardState.name: Tide-Splitter Rukan
hardState.description: A daring super-penguin hero of Aurora Stack, whose experimental fishing gun techniques doubled the colonyâ€™s catch.

hardState.name: Shadow-Broker Nyla
hardState.description: The unofficial mayor of Nightfall Shelf, a veiled negotiator who settles disputes before anyone admits they exist.

hardState.name: Fissure-Walker Draen
hardState.description: A reckless hero of Nightfall Shelf who walks the very lip of the Glow-Fissure to draw power from its light.

hardState.name: Fissure-Drawn Runes
hardState.description: A school of ice-magic where glowing sigils are etched with claws chilled in the light of the Glow-Fissure.

hardState.name: Harmonic Harpoon Arrays
hardState.description: Advanced fishing guns that fire sonic-locked harpoons, letting penguins reel in entire shoals with minimal effort.

hardState.name: Covenant of the Ice
hardState.description: A mystical cult drawn to the power near The Glow-Fissure

hardState.description: The enigmatic prophet of Covenant of the Ice

hardState.description: A devoted follower of Covenant of the Ice

hardState.description: A devoted follower of Covenant of the Ice
